title: Ping Problems Since Last Patch
body:
Heres my Tracer


Tracing route to 192.64.170.1 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1     3 ms    15 ms     3 ms  10.0.0.1 
  2    15 ms    16 ms    17 ms  96.120.77.197 
  3    14 ms    16 ms    27 ms  [edit] [68.86.213.181] 
  4    15 ms    24 ms    14 ms  [edit] [69.139.192.1] 
  5    22 ms    19 ms    24 ms  [edit] [68.86.93.173] 
  6    17 ms    24 ms    17 ms  [edit] [68.86.85.78] 
  7    16 ms    15 ms    28 ms  50.248.116.202 
  8    18 ms    16 ms    16 ms  104.160.132.46 
  9    41 ms    39 ms    32 ms  ae31-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.14] 
 10    37 ms    52 ms    35 ms  104.160.131.101 
 11    34 ms    69 ms    37 ms  


Looks fine. My connection is great.

But, ever since the last patch, at least 3 times a game, my ping will spike for no reason to 500ms for like 10 seconds.

replies.body: If you're having several spikes of ping and not consistently worse ping, a tracert when you're not actively seeing spikes won't tell us much.  I'd recommend checking out our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) which should be able to analyze your network logs and give some information for how to fix what it sees.  Let me know if it helps!
